text: The Variegateds Case () is a 1958 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikolai Dostal.Дело «Пестрых»Его спасла «Зиночка Кибрит». Боли и победы Всеволода Сафонова It stars Andrei Abrikosov, Vladimir Kenigson, and Aleksandra Kazakova. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1958 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Variegateds Case
